steps.title: Auto-Scaling & Load Testing
steps.objective: Configure Azure auto-scale & validate load performance
steps.description: Implement horizontal and vertical scaling for Container Apps, configure auto-scaling rules, and perform load testing to validate performance under varying workloads.

steps.title: Security & Compliance Hardening
steps.objective: Enable Defender for Cloud, private endpoints, alerts
steps.description: Implement advanced security monitoring with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, configure private endpoints for enhanced network security, and establish comprehensive security alerting.

steps.title: Monitoring & Observability
steps.description: Deploy comprehensive monitoring with Application Insights, create performance dashboards, implement distributed tracing, and establish alerting for application health.

steps.title: Cost Optimization & Alerts
steps.objective: Configure budget alerts and optimize cloud resources
steps.description: Implement cost monitoring and optimization strategies, configure budget alerts, optimize resource sizing, and establish cost governance policies.

steps.title: Governance & Final Validation
steps.objective: Execute QA + Nightly UAT & validate audit traceability
steps.description: Perform comprehensive QA testing, validate nightly UAT processes, ensure complete audit traceability, and confirm all governance requirements are met.

successCriteria: Auto-scaling responds correctly to load variations
Monthly costs reduced by 15% through optimization
riskFactors: Auto-scaling may cause cost spikes if misconfigured
Security changes could impact application availability
